name: ZP2KX: Zombies and Pterodactyls 20XX
summary: ZP2KX: Zombies and Pterodactyls 20XX is a multiplayer-focused shooter and the sequel to ZP2K9. The background scenario is that pterodactyls arrange deadly matches between humans and zombies. Features a standard deathmatch, team deathmatch, King of the Hill and Capture the Flag modes, as well as a special Zombie Hunt.
